welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Usworth, a charming city known for its rich history and scenic landscapes. We invite you to explore and discover all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Newcastle Airport is the largest and busiest terminal, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal at Newcastle Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tees Valley Airport offers a modern and comfortable environment for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tees Valley Airport handles all freight and cargo operations for the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
